org.hibernate.ogm.dialect.spi

Interface AssociationContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssociationContextImpl

    public interface AssociationContext
    Provides context information to GridDialects when accessing Associations.
    Author:
    Guillaume Scheibel <guillaume.scheibel@gmail.com>, Gunnar Morling

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AssociationTypeContext getAssociationTypeContext()
      Provides context information related to the given association's type.
      Tuple getEntityTuple()
      Returns a tuple representing the entity on the current side of the association for which the given operation was invoked.
      OperationsQueue getOperationsQueue()
      Provides access to the operations queue of the current flush cycle if the active dialect supports the batched execution of operations.

    • Method Detail

      • getOperationsQueue

        OperationsQueue getOperationsQueue()
        Provides access to the operations queue of the current flush cycle if the active dialect supports the batched execution of operations.
        Returns:
        the operations queue of the current flush or null if the active dialect does the batched execution of operations

      • getAssociationTypeContext

        AssociationTypeContext getAssociationTypeContext()
        Provides context information related to the given association's type.
        Returns:
        Context information related to the given association's type

      • getEntityTuple

        Tuple getEntityTuple()
        Returns a tuple representing the entity on the current side of the association for which the given operation was invoked. May be null in case this context is passed during the deletion of a transient entity.
        Returns:
        A tuple representing the entity on the current side of the association
